name: K.C.'s Fruit Scoot
description:
What if the Odyssey 2 had succeeded? This game comes from an alternate timeline where Magnavox wasn't sued by Namco and were able to make the Odyssey 3 and in turn it's flagship character got another game. 

Enjoy this classic pac-man clone with very few tweeks.  The game will get progressively harder and faster as you progress.  Try to see the bonus stage after all you beat all the levels! Get the highest score you can!

Default controls are the arrow keys, but you can configure them by pressing Control + Y   

Press a number at the start of the game to pick your difficulty! 

Not the final build, but really close to it. This game will forever be free, but feel free to donate to support future projects.

Note: The game is best played full screen, as the closer you get to the smaller size the filter for the CRT effect gets funky.

Odyssey2 font created by Justin the Almighty
